title: Fine-grain atlases of functional modes for fMRI analysis

tldr.text: This work demonstrates the benefits of extracting reduced signals on fine-grain atlases for many classic functional data analysis pipelines: stimuli decoding from 12,334 brain responses, standard GLM analysis of fMRI across sessions and individuals, data compression and meta-analysis over more than 15,000 statistical maps.
